original_text: he will give the rain for your land in its season, the early rain and the later rain, that you may gather in your grain and your wine and your oil.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너희의 땅에 이른 비, 늦은 비를 적당한 때에 내리시리니 너희가 곡식과 포도주와 기름을 얻을 것이요

sentences.original_text: he will give the rain for your land in its season
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 네 땅에 제때에 비를 주시리니

sentences.original_text: the early rain and the later rain
that you may gather in your grain and your wine and your oil
sentences.korean_translation: 곡식과 포도주와 기름을 거두게 하려 함이라
